title: Portal.2.Update.1.to.15.incl.DLC.Cracked-NoGrp
description:
1. Install Portal 2
2. Run Portal.2.Update.1.to.15.incl.DLC.exe                  
3. Install to the main install folder
4. Copy the cracked content from the Crack folder to the main install folder and overwrite    
5. Play   

read changelog.txt for information about updated content
